title: Rewind Task
content:
When the task is completed, you can use Rewind button to go to the previous step.

Select the Task you need to rewind and Click the Rewind button.

title: Resume Task
content:
All incomplete tasks can be resumed.

Select the Task that you need to resume and Click the Resume button. The page will redirect to the corresponding task's page.

title: Share Task
content:
Sharing a task allows other members of the community to contribute to the completion of the task.

Select the Task that you need to share and Click the Share button.
